location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Colonel, Officiating Agent Governor General for Rajpootana [Rājasthān], Mount Aboo [Ābu] to The Commissioner of Customs, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter confirming the contents of twenty-one cases, which were shipped from Bushire to Punjaub [Punjab] on the understanding that Pelly would write and confirm their contents.Enclosed with the letter is a copy of the suggested declaration required when confirming the contents of the cases.
